titles: By the Committee of Safety of the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. A proclamation inhibiting all meetings for the raising, or drawing together of forces, without order of the said Committee, or the Lord Fleetwood.
author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.
publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to the Committee of Safety,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Whitehall the 5th. day of November, 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
